title: How to Find Your North Node

steps.title: The North Node is a lunar node that predicts your spiritual destiny.
steps.content: The North Node is a lunar node that predicts your spiritual destiny. A lunar node describes when the moon and the sun meet, and in astrology, lunar nodes are split into two sections: the North Node and the South Node. Depending on the time and place of your birth, your North and South Node will be located in particular signs in your birth chart. Finding the placement of both in your chart can help you understand your past lives and who you hope to become. [1] X Research source The North Node: The North Node represents the things that you're capable of reaching in this life and the positive attitudes you have that will garner help from others to help you achieve it. It encourages you to make changes and venture into the unknown so that you can reach your greatest potential. The South Node: The South Node represents your past and where you are naturally most comfortable. It encourages you to examine lifestyle and relationship patterns from a past life that may not be serving you anymore. As astrologer Angel Eyedealism confirms, "the south node gives you insight into the challenges you're meant to overcome in this life."

steps.title: Use a free birth chart calculator to find your North Node.
steps.content: Use a free birth chart calculator to find your North Node. The North and South Nodes are mathematical points located directly opposite each other in your birth chart. Find these points easily by reading your birth chart . To access your birth chart, enter your date of birth, birth location, and birth time in an online birth chart calculator . [2] X Research source Alternatively, find your North Node by comparing your birth date with a North Node date table, which tracks when the sun and the moon intersected in each sign throughout history. Find a North Node date table with a quick search online.

steps.title: Aries North Node
steps.content: Aries North Node Your North Node placement challenges you to develop your confidence on your own, without relying on validation from others. Aries is associated with fierce independence, and over time, you'll learn to embrace this quality about yourself. [3] X Research source Your South Node: Libra. Libra is the sign of partnerships, so you feel most comfortable in relationships or surrounded by friends. In your present life, you're called to let go of any partnerships that may be bringing you down.

steps.title: Taurus North Node
steps.content: Taurus North Node An earth sign, the sign of Taurus has a deep connection to the material world. When your North Node is in Taurus, you are called to find stability and balance in your home life. By creating a safe, comfortable environment for yourself, you can achieve inner peace. [4] X Research source Your South Node: Scorpio. In your past lives, you may have resisted staying in one place to avoid getting close to people. Now, it's time to let your guard down and allow yourself to get attached to people and places.

steps.title: Gemini North Node
steps.content: Gemini North Node Got a passion for philosophy or language? You possess incredible knowledge. Your life's mission is to learn how to utilize your intellect to collaborate and communicate with others gracefully. Your South Node: Sagittarius. Sagittarius is associated with blunt honesty, so you have no problem sharing your opinions freely. In your present life, consider how you might word your thoughts a little more diplomatically.

steps.title: Cancer North Node
steps.content: Cancer North Node Your North Node encourages you to learn how to be more vulnerable and accept the help of others. Cancer is a rather sensitive, family-oriented sign, so it will serve you to reflect on your deeper emotions and share them with the people that you love. Your South Node: Capricorn. You are incredibly disciplined, and you prefer to do things alone when left to your own devices. Your South Node calls you to examine how you might be hiding yourself from others.

steps.title: Leo North Node
steps.content: Leo North Node Leo is a bold sign that isn't afraid to stand out. Your life's lesson is to embrace these qualities in yourself and take risks (even if it means doing your own thing sometimes). Your South Node: Aquarius. Aquarius is a very community-minded sign, so you feel most at home when you're surrounded by other people. In your present life, you're called to embrace more of a leadership role within your community.

steps.title: Virgo North Node
steps.content: Virgo North Node Your life's purpose is to put your ideas in motion. Virgo is ruled by Mercury, the planet of information and organization. [5] X Research source Try cultivating your organizational skills and focusing on everyday tasks to make your dreams a reality. Your South Node: Pisces. You are a natural dreamer and when times get tough, you may retreat to your imagination. Presently, it's time to let go of this habit so you can ground yourself in reality.

steps.title: Libra North Node
steps.content: Libra North Node To find fulfillment, you are called to deepen your connections with other people. Collaborating may be a struggle at first, but learning from others will have a profoundly beneficial impact on your life. Your South Node: Aries. A cardinal sign, Aries is associated with leadership. Though you naturally prefer to take charge, now is the time to give others a chance to lead.

steps.title: Scorpio North Node
steps.content: Scorpio North Node Your greatest life lesson with a North Node in Scoprio is to embrace the unknown and let go of things that are no longer serving you. Though moving forward may be tough at first, you'll find fulfillment when you embrace life's mysteries and relinquish control. Your South Node: Taurus. Taurus is associated with stability, so you prefer to stay in your comfort zone. In your present life, it's up to you to resist this tendency and try new things.

steps.title: Sagittarius North Node
steps.content: Sagittarius North Node Sagittarius is one of the zodiac's most adventurous signs, so you're called to follow your dreams and listen to your intuition. Your North Node encourages you to follow your heart and always be honest (with yourself and other people). Your South Node: Gemini. You like staying in one place so that you can gain popularity in your community. In your present life, it's time to forgo being liked in favor of staying true to yourself (even if it means leaving familiar places and relationships).

steps.title: Capricorn North Node
steps.content: Capricorn North Node Though you have an incredibly generous heart, you may forget to take care of yourself sometimes. Your greatest lesson is to determine your personal boundaries and stick to them. That way, you can help others while also helping yourself. Your South Node: Cancer. You are naturally very sensitive and empathetic in your relationships. In your present life, your South Node compels you to consider how you might retain these qualities while also protecting yourself.

steps.title: Aquarius North Node
steps.content: Aquarius North Node Aquarius is the humanitarian of the zodiac, which means your life's mission is to recognize the impact your actions have on the world. You'll be most fulfilled fighting for causes that you care about and collaborating with others. Your South Node: Leo. Leo is the lion of the zodiac, so you're no stranger to commanding attention. In a past life, you were always the star of the show. In this lifetime, think of how you can share the spotlight with others.

steps.title: Pisces North Node
steps.content: Pisces North Node Pisces is ruled by Neptune, the planet of dreams and the subconscious. To reach your greatest potential, let yourself be a little more idealistic. Your North Node calls you to follow your wildest dreams and embrace the unexpected. Your South Node: Virgo. You feel most at ease when you've got everything planned out. Following a predictable path may have served you in a past life, but now is the time to steer from your plans and go in a different direction.
